showScoreExcerpt:
"Wonderful performances by Parker and Arndt add immensely to the pleasure of 'Heisenberg.' Some may say that the part of Georgie is made for Parker, but that statement belies her talent, which makes the difficult role look easy. Arndt shines in his first lead on Broadway...Ably directed by Brokaw, 'Heisenberg' envelopes us into the funny, sad, and sometimes dangerous vortex of a relationship...Itâ€™s an exciting piece of theatre."
